attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand that something is now done to stop the corruption happening in Scotland surrounding the Hollie Greig case amongst many others.
This is something which is now being highlighted across the world .
This is not something which is going to be swept under the carpet and it is now time for you as Prime Minister of this country to make the changes which are needed to keep our children safe

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
